title: Zcash Leads Privacy Coin Surge Amid Surveillance Fears
contentSnippet: Privacy coins have posted triple-digit weekly gains as investors seek protection from surveillance and capital freezes.

title: Gold buying boom mirrors Bitcoin’s momentum: Deutsche Bank
contentSnippet: Gold has hit its highest share of central bank reserves in decades, potentially shaping Bitcoin’s path as a future reserve asset, according to Deutsche Bank.

title: South Africans can now pay with crypto at 650K stores via Scan to Pay
contentSnippet: A new integration allows South Africans to spend Bitcoin, stablecoins and other crypto directly at more than 650,000 merchants nationwide.

title: $11B Bitcoin whale bets on BTC, ETH correction with $900M shorts
contentSnippet: In one of their first moves in two months, the Bitcoin whale returned to short Bitcoin and Ether for hundreds of millions of dollars, betting on their short-term price decline.

title: Bitcoin Ready for 'Big Moves' on 91% Chance of Fed Rate Cut: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 10, 2025

title: Bitcoin mining in 2025, explained: From hashrate to rewards
contentSnippet: Discover how Bitcoin mining runs in 2025: From halving rewards and ASIC rigs to mining pools, hashprice shifts and power use.

title: Can Solana outperform Ether if ETFs get approved?
contentSnippet: How a US SOL ETF could shift access, flows and usage — plus the key metrics to watch to see whether Solana outperforms Ether.

title: HashKey crypto exchange eyes Hong Kong listing this year: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: HashKey Group, the operator of Hong Kong’s top licensed crypto exchange, has reportedly filed for an IPO in the city, aiming to raise up to $500 million.

title: Analysis: Market Is Undervaluing the Possibility Cardano (ADA) ETF Is Delayed Until 2026
contentSnippet: With the SEC running on skeleton staff during the prolonged U.S. government shutdown, crypto ETF reviews are effectively frozen. A weeks-long pause could push Cardano’s long-awaited ETF decision past

title: XRP whales dump $50M per day: Will it crash the price?
contentSnippet: XRP price risked a 22% drop to $2.20, fuelled by selling from whales, increased supply on exchanges and a weakening technical structure.

title: South Korea ramps up crypto seizures, will target cold wallets
contentSnippet: South Korea’s National Tax Service warned that cold wallets are not beyond its reach, as it will conduct home searches to combat tax evasion.

title: Crypto Industry Unimpressed by Possible Exemptions from Bank of England Stablecoin Cap
contentSnippet: Industry groups argued that any cap would be difficult to enforce, and would slow the development of the UK’s burgeoning crypto sector.

title: Bitcoin Miners Rally in Pre-Market as Sector Nears $90B Market Cap
contentSnippet: AI and high-performance computing demand fuel fresh gains, with miners eyeing a potential $100 billion market cap by year-end

title: China Expands Rare Earth Export Controls Ahead of Trump-Xi Meeting
contentSnippet: This move could disrupt global supply chains, drive up prices, and have ripple effects across financial markets.

title: Hyperliquid Introduces 'Based Streams,' a DEX-Powered Live Streaming Platform
contentSnippet: The livestreaming feature lets creators broadcast trades, accept token donations, and reward viewers via its Hypercore protocol

title: Bitcoin Mayer Multiple: BTC price can hit $180K before being ‘overbought’
contentSnippet: Bitcoin remained closer to “oversold” during its latest all-time highs, according to the Mayer Multiple, which suggested a potential price target of $180,000.

title: Bitcoin Implied Volatility Reaches 2.5-Month High as Seasonal Strength Kicks In
contentSnippet: Implied volatility hits a 2.5-month high as price momentum and historical patterns point to a strong Q4

title: ジャック・ドーシーのブロック社、ビットコイン決済・ウォレットソリューション「Square Bitcoin」提供開始へ
contentSnippet: ジャック・ドーシー氏率いる米ブロック社が、Squareで仮想通貨ビットコイン決済・変換サービスを開始する。初年度手数料無料で、売上の一部をBTCに自動変換可能だ。

title: ビットコイン、2030年までに金と並ぶ中央銀行準備資産に　ドイツ銀行が予測
contentSnippet: ドイツ銀行のアナリストらが、ビットコインが2030年までに中央銀行の準備資産となると予測した。ボラティリティ低下や規制整備が進む中、ビットコインは、金と共に中央銀行のバランスシートに共存する可能性があると見ている。

title: Privacy Tokens Zcash, Dash, Railgun Rip Higher as Market Rotates Back to 2018 Narratives
contentSnippet: What stands out is how capital is rotating into the once-forgotten privacy sector at the exact moment broader liquidity is still searching for a narrative.

title: Bitcoin 'OG' Whale Raises Bearish BTC Bet Worth Over $400M
contentSnippet: The OG whale reportedly sold BTC in the spot market earlier this week.

title: カルビー×SNPIT「じゃがりこ」NFTコラボ発表　10月15日から販売開始へ
contentSnippet: ブロックチェーンゲームSNPITとカルビーが「じゃがりこ」NFTコラボを開始。10月15日から段階的に販売。ミントスクロールを使って新カメラBOXを生成可能。価格や販売スケジュールの詳細を解説。

title: Bitcoiners can up their price targets with new $110K bottom: Analyst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin analyst James Check stated that there is no reason for Bitcoin to retreat to $95,000, adding that if it does, the rally is likely over for some time.

title: XRP Struggles to Reclaim $3 as Spot Demand Thins
contentSnippet: Traders are closely watching whether the $2.78 support level holds and how leverage unwinds might affect price volatility.

title: Monero Releases Privacy Boost Against Sneaky Network Nodes
contentSnippet: Monero has released the 'Fluorine Fermi' update to enhance user privacy against spy nodes.

title: Crypto Salaries Are Down This Year Despite Bitcoin's Historic Rally
contentSnippet: Pay across the industry is contracting even as Bitcoin hits new highs, in a shift toward leaner operations and more structured compensation.

title: Here's What to Expect From Solana as Daily Transactions Fall Ahead of ETF Deadline
contentSnippet: Solana’s price action could be muted despite its ETF approval deadline, Decrypt was told, as its transactions fall 50% from their July peak.

title: New OpenAI Research Touts Political Bias Down 30% in Latest ChatGPT Models
contentSnippet: OpenAI says its latest research shows ChatGPT models demonstrate reduced political bias, marking a shift toward measurable neutrality.

title: ステーブルコイン史上最大の買収案件か、コインベース・マスターカードが買収競合＝フォーチュン誌
contentSnippet: コインベースとマスターカードがステーブルコイン企業BVNK買収で競合している。過去最大規模の20億ドル案件となる可能性。ステーブルコインブームが本格化か。

title: 大口投資家が4億ドル超のビットコインショート、市場は冷静な反応
contentSnippet: 暗号資産（仮想通貨）市場では、大口投資家が4.2億ドルのビットコインのショートポジションを構築し市場に警戒感。一方で現物ETFへの資金流入は8日連続で継続。ビットコインは121,000ドル台で推移し、短期的な値動きに注目が集まる。

title: Coinbase, Mastercard Eye Billion Dollar Deals for Stablecoin Firm BVNK: Report
contentSnippet: The two companies are reportedly in separate talks to acquire BVNK, a London-based fintech building stablecoin infrastructure.

title: BitLendingが最高料率10%を出せる理由──J-CAM運営メディアIolite編集長に聞いた暗号資産レンディングの未来
contentSnippet: 日本発の暗号資産レンディング「BitLending」。J-CAM・Iolite編集長の八木紀彰氏に、業界最高水準10%の料率を実現する理由とFireblocksによる堅牢なセキュリティ体制、海外展開について聞いた。

title: ルクセンブルクの政府系ファンド「FSIL」、ビットコインETF投資が明らかに　ポートフォリオの1%相当
contentSnippet: ルクセンブルクの財務大臣は、同国の政府系ファンドFSILがポートフォリオの1%を仮想通貨ビットコインのETFに投資していると明かした。政府承認の新たな投資方針を適用している。

title: アーサー・ヘイズが「ビットコイン相場の4年サイクル」終焉を主張　米中通貨供給に注目
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨アナリストのアーサー・ヘイズ氏が、ビットコインの半減期サイクル終焉を予想した。米中の通貨供給変化が価格を左右すると分析し、トランプ政権下での上昇要因を解説している。

title: ブラックロックのビットコイン現物ETF、BTC保有数量が80万枚超え　最大供給量の3.8%超に
contentSnippet: ブラックロックの仮想通貨ビットコイン現物ETFのIBITは、保有するビットコインの数量が節目の80万BTCを超えた。ビットコインの最大供給量の3.8%超に達している。

title: Intel Bets Recovery on Panther Lake AI Chip as Foundry Bleeds Billions
contentSnippet: Intel’s first processor on its 18A manufacturing process arrives as AMD eats into market share amid a $3 billion quarterly loss.

title: Aleo創設者が語る「プライベートスマートコントラクト」の将来性と日本市場への期待｜CoinPostインタビュー
contentSnippet: 革新的ブロックチェーン「Aleo」を創設したハワード・ウー氏に独占インタビュー。ゼロ知識証明技術の可能性、プライベートステーブルコインの未来、規制当局との連携、そして日本市場への展望を語ります。

title: 'Long Live the King': Bitcoin Billionaire Arthur Hayes Predicts the BTC 4-Year Cycle Is Over
contentSnippet: Crypto entrepreneur Arthur Hayes predicts that Bitcoin's typical four-year cycle is over as an increased money supply will benefit digital assets.

title: Why JPMorgan Thinks Solana ETFs Won't Hit as Hard as Bitcoin, Ethereum Funds
contentSnippet: Solana ETFs won't see the same investor interest as their Bitcoin and Ethereum counterparts, JPMorgan analysts said. Here's why.

title: English Man Gets Prison Time After Spending Covid Loan on Crypto and Gambling
contentSnippet: Haralambos Ioannou of Edlesborough was sentenced to 22 months in prison for illegally obtaining a second business relief loan—and spending the funds on crypto.
